item.title: Jan Wildeboer üò∑:krulorange:
item.description: German public broadcaster BR published a 3 part series called #DirtyLittleSecrets on how #Spotify uses fake artists to make more money. How the record labels were part of this. And how real artists are left behind. In May 2023. So I am a little surprised how this suddenly becomes a new story. Trailer: https://www.ardmediathek.de/video/Y3JpZDovL2JyLmRlL2Jyb2FkY2FzdFNjaGVkdWxlU2xvdC81M2ZhOTJjYy1jNmFkLTQ5MGYtOGVjMi1hYWNkNzQzOGU3ZDg

item.title: Spencer LaVere Smith
item.description: I'm excited that Pacific Optica is releasing their new scan optics. https://pacificoptica.com/ventana/ For those of you who know two-photon imaging well, check out the specs on the link. These optics are unprecedented. They're easy to integrate into a rig (using Thorlabs SM2 and SM3 threads) and they provide a way bigger diffraction-limited imaging field-of-view. No more vignetting due to the scan engine.

item.title: Katharine Hayhoe
item.description:
Last week, Finland's Publication Forum announced that it is downgrading its classification of 271 journals to the lowest level, zero. This includes 187 MDPI and 82 Frontiers journals. Read more by @deevybee.bsky.social here:

Finland vs. Germany: the case ...

item.title: NormanDunbar
item.description: Just checked PiHole. Nearly 76% of internet requests are being blocked. Looks like the Samsung smart TV is the biggest culprit, phoning home to loggers at Samsung, and also to Netflix loggers too, which we don't have a subscription to!Get yourself a PiHole!
